title: Ticket #799: permission denied by the schedd when the startd sends ALIVE messages
description:
Details in the RUST ticket, but short version of what the user reported:

  A slot runs a job and the schedd still has a claim on the slot but doesn't have any more jobs to send. After like 50 minutes, we'll start getting the PERMISSION DENIED messages at the schedd for the ALIVE commands from the stard. At that point we can't use the slot again until it does the reset for I think the claim timing out.
remarks:
2009-Nov-17 10:50:40 by zmiller:
i believe this was a misconfiguration, them setting HOSTALLOW_WRITE_SCHEDD to be too restrictive. since i recommended changes, have not heard back on the matter. i will ping them one more time via RUST before resolving that ticket and this one.

2009-Nov-17 12:44:50 by zmiller:
RUST resolved.
